articles.author: CHARLOTTE GRAHAM-MCLAY Associated Press
articles.title: A missing surfer in Australia is believed dead in a shark attack, police say - ABC News
articles.description: Authorities say a surfer missing in Australia is believed dead in a shark attack and they are searching the waters where the man disappeared
articles.content:
WELLINGTON, New Zealand -- A surfer missing in Australia is believed to have died in a shark attack, authorities said Friday, as they searched the waters where the man disappeared.
